intro.description: DExplore, the data exploration perspective, contains tools to access and present data files, and examine and visualize their contents.

item.title: Open Data Exploration Perspective
item.description: To inspect data effectively, the DExplore perspective is the best perspective to use, change to this now. Select Window->Open Perspective->DExplore in the menu bar at the top of the workbench. This step changes the perspective to set up the Eclipse workbench for data exploration. You can click the "Click to Perform" button to have the data exploration perspective opened automatically.
